name: text_area
docstring: The input part of a TextArea, may be used by itself.

properties.name: resize
properties.description: The resize behavior of the text area

properties.name: auto_complete
properties.description: Whether the form control should have autocomplete enabled

properties.name: auto_focus
properties.description: Automatically focuses the textarea when the page loads

properties.name: default_value
properties.description: The default value of the textarea when initially rendered

properties.name: dirname
properties.description: Name part of the textarea to submit in 'dir' and 'name' pair when form is submitted

properties.name: form
properties.description: Associates the textarea with a form (by id)

properties.name: max_length
properties.description: Maximum number of characters allowed in the textarea

properties.name: min_length
properties.description: Minimum number of characters required in the textarea

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the textarea, used when submitting the form

properties.name: read_only
properties.description: Indicates whether the textarea is read-only

properties.name: required
properties.description: Indicates that the textarea is required
